title: Early registration for honest.cash
body:
Hello!

honest.cash is a social network where you can earn (Bitcoin) Cash if you create value.
Our mission is improve the quality of content on the internet and to get people paid for doing work they love.
Since you signed up for an early invitation, we will let you know once you will be able to start writing and earn Cash.

In the meantime, you can follow us on Twitter and stay tuned!


To complete your sign-up please open the following link:

<%-VERIFICATION_LINK%>

Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team
